author: Benjamin Hoogterp
comment: No Tizen, huh?  Any chance of a developer API so someone who really likes your main app could write their own?

author: John Hersh
comment: Have been using the main app for at least two years now. Recently got an Android smart watch (call me late to the party if you like) and thought "It would be great if I could use Time Recorder on here." Well, after a brief search of the play store there it is! Have to agree with a previous review that a vibrate on punching would be a very nice touch though. Perhaps in a future update? Keep up the great work!
title: Time recorder wear integration? Yes Please!

author: Matt Lock
comment: I can't get the voice commands working - I've tried the "Start Punch" but my watch just does a google search and loads a book advert up.  I have a Sony Z5 with a Sony SW3.  Can't find any help on this, hence asking in the review.

author: Andriy Rusyn
comment: Easily able to switch tasks on the fly with no hassle, makes tracking time a breeze.
title: Awesome

author: Stephen De Tomasi
comment: Right now, the functionality of this app is pretty weak. If it hit punch it doesn't give me any indication that it is running, nor does it give me indication that I am checking in or out. When you try to run the app (start tr) it doesn't come up automatically (you have to swipe through your notifications to find it). For something that is supposed to be convenient, it's kinda annoying. I think I'll stick to the stock stopwatch app for now.
title: Needs an update

author: Michael Borland
comment: On my Sony Smartwatch 3, "Start TR" does  nothing; nothing appears when I start TR from the voice command or using the touch screen. No notifications appear on the device when I check in/out using the phone app, even though I've verified that it is enabled and that Android Wear is not blocking this app's notifications. "Start punch" punches me in, but there's no apparent way to select the task, which makes it fairly useless for me.
title: Limited functionality

author: Jean Farias Roldão
comment: Stopped working with LG G watch :(

author: Christian Alarcon
comment: But basic useability. Great time saving tool!
title: Does what it says with great convenience

author: farin galeng
comment: Can u please update for gear s2
title: Brrr

author: Dave Gandy
comment: Fantastic, just copy details to my time sheet
title: Fantastic

author: Stefano Prezioso
comment: The notification on Android Wear cannot be changed like the normal notification can, or might be a bug preventing it from following the template entered by the user on the app. Also, on Moto 360, the task list when switching tasks is shifted too far too the left, which makes reading and selection somewhat difficult. It should be centered.

reply.author: DynamicG
reply.content: hi, can you contact me and provide more details regarding the first issue? thanks

title: Needs some work

author: Daren Broadway
comment: Wouldn't use any other app. It does exactly what I need and more.
title: Great daily app
